text: The women's 100 metre backstroke S14 event at the 2016 Paralympic Games took place on 8 September, at the Olympic Aquatics Stadium. Two heats were held, the first with four swimmer and the second with five swimmers. The swimmers with the eight fastest times advanced to the final. ==Records== , the existing World and Paralympic records were as follows. {| class="wikitable" |- |World record | |1:04.70 |Glasgow, Great Britain |28 March 2015 |- |Paralympic record | |1:08.93 |London, Great Britain |31 August 2012 |- |2016 World leading | |1:04.73 |Sheffield, Great Britain |27 July 2016 |} ==Heats== ===Heat 1=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !
